text: Jumpin' Jack Flash is a 1986 American comedy movie directed by first time director Penny Marshall. It stars Whoopi Goldberg, Stephen Collins, John Wood, Carol Kane, Peter Michael Goetz, Annie Potts, Jeroen Krabb√©, Jonathan Pryce and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Penny Marshall
title: Jumpin' Jack Flash (movie)
